title: Subject: Vendor Invoice Follow-up – PO 4500123456
summary_sentences: We have received Invoice INV-2025/0911 from M/s ABC Components for ₹ 4,25,000 against GRN 90007821.
As per PO terms, payment is due within 15 days of GRN.
- Finance must verify GST details and process by 28/09/2025.
- In case of mismatch, vendor to be notified immediately.
